Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia
Saudi Pharmaceutical Industries and Medical Appliances Corp

Description: Saudi Industrial Investment Group (known as: SIIG) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2004. SIIG operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. SIIG is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1996.
